scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.release: npx --no-install standard-version && git push --follow-tags && git checkout main && git merge development && git push && git checkout development
scripts.release-major: npx --no-install standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags && git checkout main && git merge development && git push && git checkout development
scripts.release-minor: npx --no-install standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags && git checkout main && git merge development && git push && git checkout development
scripts.release-patch: npx --no-install standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags && git checkout main && git merge development && git push && git checkout development
scripts.add-dependencies: npm add @splitbee/web autoprefixer next postcss react react-dom sass tailwindcss
scripts.remove-dependencies: npm remove @splitbee/web autoprefixer next postcss react react-dom sass tailwindcss
scripts.add-devDependencies: npm add --save-dev @types/node @types/react @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser cz-conventional-changelog eslint eslint-plugin-react standard-version typescript
scripts.remove-devDependencies: npm remove @types/node @types/react @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser cz-conventional-changelog eslint eslint-plugin-react standard-version typescript
scripts.reinstall-dependencies: npm run remove-dependencies && npm run remove-devDependencies && npm run add-dependencies && npm run add-devDependencies
